name: Arthur Abon
text: There is already a speedster in Filipino comics: Ipo-ipo - he runs as fast as the wind and can become ethereal like air (both abilities exhibited by the Flash).    Kapitan Kidlat actually flies and shoots lightning.     http://www.philippinecomics.net/characters/Ipoipo/Ipoipo.htm
